wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Hardy, 1st Baronet (23 February 1809 – 9 July 1888), was a British Conservative Member of Parliament.

response: *Sir John Hardy, 1st Baronet (1809–1888), British Conservative Member of Parliament
*Sir John Hardy, 1st Baronet; MP for Midhurst (1859), Dartmouth (1860–1868) and Warwickshire South (1868–1874)
Hardy was the fourth son of Sir John Hardy, 1st Baronet, of Dunstall Hall, and was educated at Eton and Christ Church, Oxford.
